Posts.Content: Hi linda; My mom had breast cancer too, It started when she was 61 years of age, she done almost 15 chemos until on the age of 71, doctor were amazed with her courage and confidence as she gone through  out medication... just be strong have faith in the Lord, having  a positive outlook in life, you will get better and better...

Posts.Content: hi What my mom did is that she followed medication of doctor she had a chemotherapy every 21 days and 1 radiotherapy but she didnt all relied to that medication she also monitored her food as well as she take herbal plants such as guyabano leaves that grows in tropical countries, that leaves boiled and drink to minimize and eradicate cancer cells on the body..  as well as she take Pi water that was discovered I think in china but sale through online..
Posts.Title: What i need to do in Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Hi kathy; My mom had breast cancer too and started to lost her hair during her first chemothery, I saw her scared and afraid to go out when her hair started to fall out for the first time, she was so shy and wanted to be inside home doesnt want to talk to anyone until I decided to talk to her heart to heart.. I said dont worry mom after your chemo your hair will grow soon, time is so fast .. your hair will be back  and there are treatments for cancer lots of of technology nowadays.. Just be strong have faith! Mom when I look at you using scarf on your head, you look like a "donya" rich old woman...see the diffrence when you have your hair "hindi ka mapagkamalang donya" but now! look at you! Everyone will bow at you..just add a little jewelries .. " feeling mayaman kna!" donyang donya"!!.. and suddenly my mom bust into laughter... starting that day my mom always mingle with our neighbors and friends always present in church ,she went to church by herself even without companion and our priest really felt amazed with her confidence... even in mall she never get tired shopping and roaming around while me started to complain mom could we stop for a minute i felt tired .. Mom i said I guess im the one who are suffering from cancer cause I get tired evertime we shop not you.. and she will laugh and grab my hand and roam around look for  nice shoes and clothes for her...

Posts.Title: Scared about losing hair

Posts.Content: HI, My mOm has a stage 4 breast cancer, but she lives longer for almost 5 years, going throught under chemo theraphy and radio theraphy , back n forth every month and taking her medicines on time makes her better. but what makes her stronger is that my mom never gives up She is strong  woman i'v ever known she is 72 years old and still kicking and fighting the cancer for the certain range of years. But what makes her special than the other cancer patients is that "worship is her battle cry" always praying and praising God , even if she  has no hair, still keep coming to church without worrying her hair! and the other cure for her cancer is that her love tank on her hearts never runs out!  She always let us feel how much she love us, not only us but people around us. She never thinks she has a cancer, Medicines is not the only one that can cure your diseases but deep within your soul, cleans it , ensure that your love in your heart never runs out, be happy, be kind, and have FAITH in your heart that you will be  cancer free.. Always smile, dont stress yourself cause it can only add to your worries..Listen to your favorite music and sing a song that comes from your heart.. and last Have faith and Trust God , glorify God, and let God enter to your heart coz God will heal you because HE loves you that much.. and you are God's powerful champion! He will never ever let you down! :)
